duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide counseling and therapy to individuals and groups dealing with mental health and substance use issues.
Conduct mental health assessments and create treatment plans for clients.
Manage cases and provide crisis intervention services when needed.
Facilitate group therapy sessions and advocate for clients' needs.
Collaborate with other professionals to support the recovery and well-being of clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's and Masters Degrees in Mental Health or related field
